page.title: 13RECREATION
page.content: In the village there are no clubs for children to join apart from the Brownie pack.The children make there own amusement and sometimes go outside the village to participate in swimming at the Ongar Sports Centre.The 3 favourite pasttimes of the children are horse riding,fishing and riding BMX bikes.Some children have their own ponies or horses and others hire them from riding stables or friends.Most of the children fish in the river roding and catch Perch,Dace,Roach,Chubb,Pike and minows.BMX bikes are very popular and the children build ramps and practise different tricks on their bikes.Some of the children enjoy roller skating and jogging.Most of the children are fond of pets and keep a variety of dogs,cats,gerbils,rabbits, fish,guinea pigs and birds
